name: LoadingView
summary: Loading animation for UIView, Navigation Bar and UITableView along with easy customization.
description: 'Loading view is a interactive loading indicator that can be used with any UIView. It also contains easy customization of the loading indicator along with customization to its border, shadow and corner radius. Now compatible with iOS 10.0 and above! Added Navigation Bar Loading Indicators. Added Shimmer and indicator option in Loading. Added LoadingDots to UITableView! No need to give class to a view to use Spinner. Just use UIView.startSpinning() / stopSpinning()'
